ygData.subject: Re: Hammer of Wrath
ygData.msgSnippet: Is it possible you were getting the message when you tried to bash?  If you don t have a magic shield your bash will not work on magic only creatures. I myself
ygData.messageBody:
Is it possible you were getting the message when you tried to bash? If you
don't have a magic shield your bash will not work on magic only creatures.
I myself have had no problems with the hammer.

Bronze, Povar Server

>From: billy_kendall@...
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqpaladin] Hammer of Wrath
>Date: 25 May 1999 14:18:58 -0000
>
>From: billy_kendall@...
>
>I have a question concerning the Hammer of Wrath. I just obtained 15th
>level and the Hammer of Wrath spell. Now when i summon this thing and then
>have it in my possesion I can right click it and it says that it is a MAGIC
>ITEM, but I went to Befallen last night and when I tried to hit an Ice
>Boned Skeleton with it, it said that the skele was invulnerable! I thought
>that I would be able to hit creatures that were only susceptible to magic
>attack with this hammer, you know, things like Willow Wisps and the such?
>Does anyone know what the deal is with this?
>
